modes.title: Modes
modes.createModeHelpText: Modes are specialized personas that adapt Roo's behavior. <0>Learn about using modes</0> or <1>configuring modes.</1>

apiConfiguration.title: API Configuration
apiConfiguration.select: Select which API configuration to use for this mode

tools.title: Available tools
tools.builtInModesText: Tools for built-in modes cannot be changed

roleDefinition.title: Role definition
roleDefinition.description: Define Roo's expertise and personality for this mode. This description shapes how Roo will behave and perform tasks.

description.title: Short description (for humans)
description.description: Short description displayed in the mode selection dropdown.

whenToUse.title: When to use (optional)
whenToUse.description: Describe when this mode should be used. This helps the Orchestrator choose the right mode for a task.

customInstructions.title: Custom mode instructions (optional)
customInstructions.description: Add behavior recommendations specific to mode {{modeName}}.
customInstructions.loadFromFile: Custom instructions for mode {{mode}} can also be loaded from the .researcherry/rules-{{slug}}/ folder in your workspace (.researcherrymodes-{{slug}} and .clinerules-{{slug}} are deprecated and will stop working soon).

exportMode.title: Export mode
exportMode.description: Export this mode to a YAML file with all included rules for easy sharing with others.

globalCustomInstructions.title: Custom instructions for all modes
globalCustomInstructions.description: These instructions apply to all modes. They set the base behavior that can be extended with the instructions below. <0>Learn more</0>
globalCustomInstructions.loadFromFile: Instructions can also be loaded from the .researcherry/rules/ folder in your workspace (.researcherrymodes and .clinerules are deprecated and will stop working soon).

importMode.selectLevel: Select where to import this mode:

global.label: Global level
global.description: Available in all projects. Rules will be merged with custom instructions.

project.label: Project level
project.description: Available only in this workspace. If the exported mode contained rule files, they will be recreated in the .researcherry/rules-{slug}/ folder.

enhance.apiConfigDescription: You can select an API configuration that will always be used for prompt enhancement, or use the currently selected one
enhance.testPromptPlaceholder: Enter a prompt to test enhancement
enhance.includeTaskHistoryDescription: When enabled, the last 10 messages from the current conversation will be included as context when enhancing prompts, helping generate more relevant and context-aware suggestions.

condense.apiConfigDescription: Select which API configuration to use for context condensing operations. Leave unselected to use the currently active configuration.
